document_data.name: Tower of the Rising Moon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Rising Moon''' was the home and seat of power of the [[Lord of Highmoon|Lord]] of [[Highmoon]] in [[Deepingdale]]. It was one of the oldest landmarks of the region and its distinct horned towers were a symbol for Deepingdale since its construction, some time around the 11{{th}}century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The exterior of the tower featured horned towers,
document_data.Defense: The tower housed a garrison of guardsmen from the dale. Additionally, it had many non-magical defenses that were concealed from any would-be attackers.
document_data.History: The Tower of the Rising Moon was built in [[1022 DR]] by the half-elf hero [[Aglauntaras]]. Despite its defenses, it was noteworthy for never having to repel a serious invasion or assault.
